aarakshitha piyawarak washayen chinaye pamanak nowa in bahara ratawal gananawaka ma nagara thahanam kalapa bawata path karala, janathawage gaman biman sima karala, pasal pamanak nowa karmantha shala wasa damala, saka katayuthu ayaku hamu wu wita ee awata siyalu dena ma nirodhayanaya kara dawas 14kata kotu karala aadi washayen ganna piyawarawalin samajaye boho katayuthu adala wenawa.
